++ Second Title

++++ Fourth Title

.colors_container {
    width: 100%;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -moz-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
    -webkit-flex-direction: column;
       -moz-box-orient: vertical;
       -moz-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: column;
            flex-direction: column;
    margin: 0 auto;
    font-weight: 700;
}

.colors_container > .colors,
.colors_container > .subcolors {
    width: 100%;
    -webkit-flex-shrink: 0;
        -ms-flex-negative: 0;
            flex-shrink: 0;
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -moz-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-flex-wrap: wrap;
        -ms-flex-wrap: wrap;
            flex-wrap: wrap;
}

.colors > .color,
.subcolors > .color {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -moz-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-orient: horizontal;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
    -webkit-flex-direction: row;
       -moz-box-orient: horizontal;
       -moz-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: row;
            flex-direction: row;
    -webkit-box-flex: 2;
    -webkit-flex-grow: 2;
       -moz-box-flex: 2;
        -ms-flex-positive: 2;
            flex-grow: 2;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
    -webkit-justify-content: center;
       -moz-box-pack: center;
        -ms-flex-pack: center;
            justify-content: center;
    -webkit-box-align: end;
    -webkit-align-items: flex-end;
       -moz-box-align: end;
        -ms-flex-align: end;
            align-items: flex-end;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    margin: 0.5rem;
}

.colors > .color > .sub,
.subcolors > .color > .sub,
.colors > .color > .sub > .css-variable,
.subcolors > .color > .sub > .css-variable {
    display: -webkit-box;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -moz-box;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -webkit-box-orient: vertical;
    -webkit-box-direction: normal;
    -webkit-flex-direction: column;
       -moz-box-orient: vertical;
       -moz-box-direction: normal;
        -ms-flex-direction: column;
            flex-direction: column;
    -webkit-box-pack: center;
    -webkit-justify-content: center;
       -moz-box-pack: center;
        -ms-flex-pack: center;
            justify-content: center;
    -webkit-box-align: center;
    -webkit-align-items: center;
       -moz-box-align: center;
        -ms-flex-align: center;
            align-items: center;
    width: 100%;
}

.colors > .color {
    height: 7rem;
    -webkit-flex-basis: -webkit-calc((100%/2) - 2rem);
        -ms-flex-preferred-size: calc((100%/2) - 2rem);
            flex-basis: -moz-calc((100%/2) - 2rem);
            flex-basis: calc((100%/2) - 2rem);
}

.colors > .color.one {
    background-color: rgba(var(--gray-accent), 1);
}

.colors > .color.two {
    background-color: rgba(var(--orange-accent), 1);
}

.subcolors > .color {
    height: 4rem;
    font-size: 75%;
    text-align: center;
    -webkit-flex-basis: -webkit-calc((100%/6) - 2rem);
        -ms-flex-preferred-size: calc((100%/6) - 2rem);
            flex-basis: -moz-calc((100%/6) - 2rem);
            flex-basis: calc((100%/6) - 2rem);
}

.colors > .color.one,
.colors > .color.two {
    color: #f5f5f5;
}
.subcolors > .color.one,
.subcolors > .color.two {
    color: #f5f5f5;
}

.subcolors > .color.one {
    background-color: rgba(var(--light-gray-accent), 1);
}

.subcolors > .color.two {
    background-color: rgba(var(--vivid-orange-accent), 1);
}

.subcolors > .color.three{
    background-color: rgba(var(--content-bg-color), 1);
}

[[code type="css"]]
:root {
  --gray-accent: 72, 72, 72;
  --orange-accent: 229, 171, 42;
  --light-gray-accent: 131, 131, 131;
  --vivid-orange-accent: 242, 119, 25;
  --content-bg-color: 245, 245, 245;
}
body {
  color: #484848;
  color: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
}
/*=====================================*/

/*============== Header ===============*/

div#container-wrap {
  background: unset;
}
#main-content {
  margin: 0px 4em;
}
#page-content {
  position: relative;
}
#header {
  padding-bottom: 32px;
  height: 180px;
  background: url(data:image/svg+xml;base64,) 0px 60px no-repeat;
  background-size: 300px;
}
#header h2 {
  display: none;
}
#header h1 {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  margin-top: 40px;
  margin-left: 100px;
  width: 200px;
  opacity: 0;
}
@media (max-width: 479px) {
  #header h1 {
    margin-left: 60px;
  }
}
#top-bar {
  top: 180px;
  height: 31px;
}
#top-bar ul li a {
  padding-top: 15px;
  padding-bottom: 15px;
}
#top-bar .top-bar>ul>li.sfhover>a, #top-bar .top-bar>ul>li:hover>a, #top-bar .mobile-top-bar>ul>li.sfhover>a, #top-bar .mobile-top-bar>ul>li:hover>a {
  background: #fff;
  color: #484848;
  color: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
  text-decoration: none;
}
#top-bar ul li ul {
  border: unset;
  box-shadow: 0px 6px 10px 0px rgba(0, 0, 0, .5);
}
#top-bar ul li.sfhover ul li a, #top-bar ul li:hover ul li a {
  padding-top: 5px;
  padding-bottom: 5px;
  border: none;
  background: #fff;
  color: #484848;
  color: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
}
#top-bar ul li.sfhover ul li.sfhover a:hover {
  background: #484848;
  background: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
  color: #fff;
  text-decoration: none;
}
#header-extra-div-1 {
  padding: 0 5px 0 5px;
  width: calc(100% - 20px);
  height: 40px;
  border-right: 10px solid #e5ab2a;
  border-right: 10px solid rgb(var(--orange-accent));
  border-left: 10px solid #e5ab2a;
  border-left: 10px solid rgb(var(--orange-accent));
  background: #484848;
  background: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
}
#extra-div-1 {
  position: absolute;
  top: 160px;
  width: 100%;
  height: 20px;
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, #e5ab2a, #e5ab2a 20px, #838383 0, #838383 40px);
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, rgb(var(--orange-accent)), rgb(var(--orange-accent)) 20px, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 0, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 40px);
}
#extra-div-2 {
  position: absolute;
  top: 180px;
  width: 100%;
  height: 31px;
  background: #484848;
  background: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
}
@media (max-width: 580px) {
  #container #header {
    background-position: 0 70px;
    background-size: 200px;
  }
  #main-content {
    margin: 0 5%;
  }
}
#login-status ul a {
  background: #fff;
  color: #484848;
  color: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
}
#account-options li a:hover {
  background: #484848;
  background: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
  color: #f5f5f5;
  color: rgb(var(--content-bg-color));
  text-decoration: none;
}
#login-status {
  color: #f5f5f5;
  color: rgb(var(--content-bg-color));
}
/*=====================================*/

/*====== Collapsible Search Area ======*/

/* http://scp-jp-sandbox3.wikidot.com/draft:3396310-179-c4b9 */

/*======== Created by ukwhatn =========*/

/*=========== CC BY-SA 3.0 ============*/

#search-top-box {
  width: unset;
}
#search-top-box-form::after {
  position: absolute;
  top: 5px;
  left: 7.5px;
  z-index: 2;
  color: #484848;
  color: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
  content: "\f002";
  font-size: 12px;
  font-family: "FontAwesome";
  pointer-events: none;
}
#search-top-box-input {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1;
  width: 19px;
  height: 19px;
  border-radius: 35%;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
  transition: .5s ease-out, z-index .1s step-start;
}
#search-top-box-input:hover {
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
}
#search-top-box input.empty {
  color: transparent;
}
#search-top-box-input:focus {
  z-index: 3;
  width: 100px;
  height: 19px;
  border-radius: unset;
  background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 1);
  color: #484848;
  color: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
}
#search-top-box-form .btn {
  width: 1px;

/*============= Custom sidebar ==============*/

#side-bar {
  display: none;
}
.c-side {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 40;
  float: none;
  overflow-y: scroll;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 1rem 2rem 0 1rem;
  width: 19em;
  height: 100vh;
  border: none;
  border-right: 5px solid #e5ab2a;
  border-right: 5px solid rgb(var(--orange-accent));
  background: #484848;
  background: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
  transition: transform 300ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1), -webkit-transform 300ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1), -moz-transform 300ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1), -o-transform 300ms cubic-bezier(0.4, 0.0, 0.2, 1);
  -webkit-transform: translateX(-17rem);
  -moz-transform: translateX(-17rem);
  -ms-transform: translateX(-17rem);
  -o-transform: translateX(-17rem);
  transform: translateX(-17rem);
  -ms-overflow-style: none;
  scrollbar-width: none;
}
.c-side::-webkit-scrollbar {
  display: none;
}
.c-side:hover {
  left: 0;
  -webkit-transform: translateX(0);
  -moz-transform: translateX(0);
  -ms-transform: translateX(0);
  -o-transform: translateX(0);
  transform: translateX(0);
}
.c-side .newbies-side-block {
  padding: 5px 0;
  background: #e5ab2a;
  background: rgb(var(--orange-accent));
  text-align: center;
  font-size: 1.5em;
}
.c-side .newbies-side-block a {
  color: #fff;
  font-weight: bold;
}
.c-side .newbies-side-block .collapsible-block .collapsible-block-folded .collapsible-block-link {
  border-left: unset;
  background: unset;
  color: #fff;
}
.c-side .newbies-side-block .collapsible-block .collapsible-block-unfolded .collapsible-block-link {
  border-left: unset;
  background: unset;
  color: #fff;
}
.c-side .collapsible-block .collapsible-block-unfolded .collapsible-block-link {
  width: 90%;
}
.c-side .collapsible-block-content .menu-item {
  margin: 0 0 0 10px;
  padding: 0 0 0 15px;
  border-left: 10px solid #e5ab2a;
  border-left: 10px solid rgb(var(--orange-accent));
}
.c-side .collapsible-block-content .menu-item p {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}
.c-side .newbies-side-block .menu-item {
  text-align: left;
  font-size: 12.8px;
}
.c-side .menu {
  margin: 0 0 0 10px;
  padding: 0 0 0 15px;
  border-left: 10px solid #e5ab2a;
  border-left: 10px solid rgb(var(--orange-accent));
}
.c-side .menu-item {
  position: relative;
}
.c-side .menu-item p {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: row;
  justify-content: space-between;
}
.c-side .side-block a {
  color: #fff;
}
.c-side .menu-item .sub-text {
  color: #e5ab2a;
  color: rgb(var(--orange-accent));
  font-size: 90%;
}
@media (max-width: 479px) {
  .c-side {
    left: -1.5rem;
    -webkit-transition: left 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    -moz-transition: left 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    -ms-transition: left 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    -o-transition: left 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
    transition: left 0.5s ease-in-out 0.1s;
  }
  #u-side:target~.c-side {
    left: 17rem;
    z-index: 200;
    transition: none;
  }
  #u-side:target~.c-side:hover {
    left: 0;
    transition: none;
    -webkit-transform: translateX(0);
    -moz-transform: translateX(0);
    -o-transform: translateX(0);
    transform: translateX(0);
  }
}
.close-ex {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 100;
  display: none;
  font-size: 0px;
}
#u-side:target~.close-ex {
  display: block;
}
.open-menu {
  display: none;
}
.u-sidebar {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0px;
  left: 1em;
  z-index: 5;
  display: none;
}
.u-sidebar a:hover {
  text-decoration: none;
}
@media (max-width: 479px) {
  .u-sidebar {
    display: block;
    padding: 0;
  }
  .u-sidebar a {
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 0.5em;
    left: 0.5em;
    z-index: 15;
    width: 30px;
    height: 30px;
    border: 0.2em solid #484848 !important;
    border: 0.2em solid rgb(var(--gray-accent)) !important;
    border-radius: 10px;
    background-color: #f5f5f5 !important;
    background-color: rgb(var(--content-bg-color)) !important;
    color: #484848 !important;
    color: rgb(var(--gray-accent)) !important;
    text-align: center;
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 30px;
    font-family: san-serif;
    line-height: 0.9em;
  }
}
.c-side>.side-block>.menu .menu-item a:hover:before {
  opacity: 1;
  transition: all 0.2s ease-in-out;
  animation: sl 0.7s linear forwards;
}
.c-side>.side-block>.menu .menu-item a:before {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 18px;
  background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%20id%3D%22%E3%83%AC%E3%82%A4%E3%83%A4%E3%83%BC_1%22%20data-name%3D%22%E3%83%AC%E3%82%A4%E3%83%A4%E3%83%BC%201%22%20viewBox%3D%220%200%201056%20857%22%20style%3D%22width%3A%2032px%3B%20height%3A%2032px%22%3E%3Cdefs%3E%3Cstyle%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A%2F%2Fwww.w3.org%2F2000%2Fsvg%22%3E.cls-0%7Bfill%3A%23e5ab2a%3B%0A%20%20%20%20transform%3A%20rotateZ(90deg)%3B%0A%20%20%20%20transform-origin%3A%20center%3B%7D.cls-2%7Bfill%3A%23e5ab2a%3B%0A%20%20%20%20transform%3A%20rotateZ(90deg)%3B%0A%20%20%20%20transform-origin%3A%20center%3B%7D%0A%3C%2Fstyle%3E%3C%2Fdefs%3E%3Cg%20id%3D%22layer1%22%3E%3Cpath%20id%3D%22path1274%22%20class%3D%22cls-0%22%20d%3D%22M524.15%2C13.22%2C97.59%2C259.5%2C215.8%2C327.75l308.35-178%2C308.35%2C178L950.72%2C259.5Z%22%2F%3E%3Cpath%20id%3D%22path1276%22%20class%3D%22cls-2%22%20d%3D%22M363.57%2C276.56l-266%2C153.56L215.8%2C498.37l266-153.56Zm321.17%2C0L566.53%2C344.81l266%2C153.56%2C118.22-68.25ZM363.57%2C447.19l-266%2C153.56L215.8%2C669l266-153.56Zm321.17%2C0L566.53%2C515.44%2C832.5%2C669l118.22-68.25Z%22%2F%3E%3C%2Fg%3E%3C%2Fsvg%3E");

}
@keyframes sl {
  0% {
    background-position: 0 center;
    filter: opacity(0.8);
  }

    background-position: 100% center;
    filter: opacity(0);
  }
}

.scp-image-block {

}

}
.scp-image-block .scp-image-caption {

}
.scp-image-block .scp-image-caption:before {

  top: -5px;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;

  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, rgb(var(--orange-accent)), rgb(var(--orange-accent)) 10px, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 0, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 20px);
  content: '';
}

/*================= Footer ==================*/

#footer {
  background: #484848;

}
#footer .options {
  width: 100%;
  text-align: center;
}
#license-area {

  background: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
  color: #f5f5f5;
  color: rgb(var(--content-bg-color));
}

/*============= Page Content ================*/

h1, #page-title {
  color: #f27719;
  color: rgb(var(--vivid-orange-accent));
}
#page-title {
  border-width: 2px;
  border-color: #838383;
  border-color: rgb(var(--light-gray-accent));
}
h2, h3, h4, h5, h6 {
  color: #484848;

}
blockquote {

}

  background: #484848;

  color: #f5f5f5;

}
a {

}

}

.collapsible-block .collapsible-block-link {

}
.collapsible-block .collapsible-block-folded .collapsible-block-link {

}
.collapsible-block .collapsible-block-unfolded .collapsible-block-link a:hover {

/*============ Rate box (Credit) ~===========*/

.rate-box-with-credit-button {

  position: relative;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box .rate-points:before {
  position: absolute;
  top: -5px;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  width: 100%;
  height: 5px;
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, #e5ab2a, #e5ab2a 10px, #838383 0, #838383 20px);
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, rgb(var(--orange-accent)), rgb(var(--orange-accent)) 10px, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 0, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 20px);
  content: '';
}
.rateBox .rate-box-with-credit-button .creditButton, .page-rate-widget-box {
  position: relative;
}
.rateBox .rate-box-with-credit-button .creditButton:before {
  position: absolute;
  top: -6px;
  left: -1px;
  z-index: -1;
  width: 26px;
  height: 5px;
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, #e5ab2a, #e5ab2a 10px, #838383 0, #838383 20px);
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, rgb(var(--orange-accent)), rgb(var(--orange-accent)) 10px, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 0, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 20px);
  content: '';
}
.creditRate .page-rate-widget-box, .modalbox .page-rate-widget-box {
  position: relative;
}
div.page-rate-widget-box .rate-points:before, .modalbox div.page-rate-widget-box .rate-points:before {
  position: absolute;
  top: -5px;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  width: 100%;
  height: 5px;
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, #e5ab2a, #e5ab2a 10px, #838383 0, #838383 20px);
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, rgb(var(--orange-accent)), rgb(var(--orange-accent)) 10px, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 0, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 20px);
  content: '';
}
#u-credit-view .modalbox {
  box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgb(72 72 72 / 50%);
}
.modalbox div.page-rate-widget-box .rate-points:before {
  z-index: 10;
}

/*============ TOUHEI-BLOCK =================*/

.touhei-block,
.touhei-block1 {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  padding: 0 10px 0.1px 10px;
  border-top: 3px solid #484848;
  border-top: 3px solid rgb(var(--gray-accent));
  background-color: #f5f5f5;
  background-color: rgb(var(--content-bg-color));
}
.touhei-block:before,
.touhei-block1:before {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -5px;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  width: 100%;
  height: 5px;
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, #e5ab2a, #e5ab2a 10px, #838383 0, #838383 20px);
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, rgb(var(--orange-accent)), rgb(var(--orange-accent)) 10px, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 0, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 20px);
  content: '';
}
.touhei-block:after,
.touhei-block1:after {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -10px;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  width: 100%;
  height: 5px;
  background: #484848;
  background: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
  content: '';
}
.touhei-block2 {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  padding: 0.1px 10px 0.1px 25px;
  padding-right: 10px;
  background-color: #f5f5f5;
  background-color: rgb(var(--content-bg-color));
  box-shadow: inset 4px 0 #484848, inset 8px 0 #f5f5f5, inset 20px 0 #484848, inset 20px 2px #484848, inset 20px -2px #484848, inset -2px 0 #484848;
  box-shadow: inset 4px 0 rgb(var(--gray-accent)), inset 8px 0 rgb(var(--content-bg-color)), inset 20px 0 rgb(var(--gray-accent)), inset 20px 2px rgb(var(--gray-accent)), inset 20px -2px rgb(var(--gray-accent)), inset -2px 0 rgb(var(--gray-accent));
}
.touhei-block3 {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  padding: 0.1px 10px 0.1px 10px;
  background-color: #484848;
  background-color: rgb(var(--gray-accent));
  color: #f5f5f5;
  color: rgb(var(--content-bg-color));
}
.touhei-block3:before {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: -8px;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  width: 100%;
  height: 8px;
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, #e5ab2a, #e5ab2a 10px, #838383 0, #838383 20px);
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, rgb(var(--orange-accent)), rgb(var(--orange-accent)) 10px, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 0, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 20px);
  content: '';
}
.touhei-block3:after {
  position: absolute;
  top: -8px;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  width: 100%;
  height: 8px;
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, #e5ab2a, #e5ab2a 10px, #838383 0, #838383 20px);
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, rgb(var(--orange-accent)), rgb(var(--orange-accent)) 10px, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 0, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 20px);
  content: '';
}
.touhei-block4 {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  padding: 0.1px 10px 0.1px 10px;
  padding-right: 10px;
  background: linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 0px, transparent 0px), linear-gradient(135deg, #484848 4.5px, #f5f5f5 4.5px, #f5f5f5 6px, #484848 6px, #484848 7px, #484848 8px, transparent 8px, transparent 9px), linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 0px, transparent 0px), linear-gradient(315deg, #484848 4.5px, #f5f5f5 4.5px, #f5f5f5 6px, #484848 6px, #484848 7px, #484848 8px, transparent 8px, transparent 9px);
  background: linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 0px, transparent 0px), linear-gradient(135deg, rgb(var(--gray-accent)) 4.5px, rgb(var(--content-bg-color)) 4.5px, rgb(var(--content-bg-color)) 6px, rgb(var(--gray-accent)) 6px, rgb(var(--gray-accent)) 7px, rgb(var(--gray-accent)) 8px, transparent 8px, transparent 9px), linear-gradient(0deg, transparent 0px, transparent 0px), linear-gradient(315deg, rgb(var(--gray-accent)) 4.5px, rgb(var(--content-bg-color)) 4.5px, rgb(var(--content-bg-color)) 6px, rgb(var(--gray-accent)) 6px, rgb(var(--gray-accent)) 7px, rgb(var(--gray-accent)) 8px, transparent 8px, transparent 9px);
  background-position: bottom left, top left, top right, bottom right;
  background-size: 50% 50%;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
}
.touhei-block4:before {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  width: 100%;
  height: 100%;
  box-shadow: inset 2px -2px #484848, inset -2px 2px #484848;
  box-shadow: inset 2px -2px rgb(var(--gray-accent)), inset -2px 2px rgb(var(--gray-accent));
  content: '';
}
.touhei-block5 {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  padding: 0.1px 10px 0.1px 10px;
  background: #f5f5f5;
  background: rgb(var(--content-bg-color));
  box-shadow: inset 2px 2px #484848, inset -2px -2px #484848;
  box-shadow: inset 2px 2px rgb(var(--gray-accent)), inset -2px -2px rgb(var(--gray-accent));
}
.touhei-block5:before {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  width: 0;
  border-width: 0 16px 16px 0;
  border-style: solid;
  border-color: #fff #fff #838383 #838383;
  border-color: #fff #fff rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) rgb(var(--light-gray-accent));
  box-shadow: -1px 1px 2px #4848481a;
  box-shadow: -1px 1px 2px rgb(var(--gray-accent) / 10%);
  content: '';
}
.touhei-block6 {
  position: relative;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  padding: 0.1px 10px 0.1px 10px;
  background: #f5f5f5;
  background: rgb(var(--content-bg-color));
}
.touhei-block6:before, .touhei-block6:after {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 8px;
  z-index: -1;
  width: 30%;
  height: 50%;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 15px #4848481a;
  box-shadow: 0 10px 15px rgb(var(--gray-accent), 10%);
  content: '';
}
.touhei-block6:before {
  left: .3em;
  -webkit-transform: rotate(-3deg);
  transform: rotate(-3deg);
}
.touhei-block6:after {
  right: .3em;
  -webkit-transform: rotate(3deg);
  transform: rotate(3deg);
}
.touhei-line {
  width: 100%;
  height: 5px;
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, #e5ab2a, #e5ab2a 10px, #838383 0, #838383 20px);
  background: repeating-linear-gradient(330deg, rgb(var(--orange-accent)), rgb(var(--orange-accent)) 10px, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 0, rgb(var(--light-gray-accent)) 20px);
}

}

}
#output [class^="ct-"] a {

}

}
#output div[class*="ct-"]::before {

}
